thread.title_full: Madonna's 4-Year-Old Twins Are Adorable in Matching Adidas Tracksuits -- See the Pic!

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Madonna's 4-Year-Old Twins Are Adorable in Matching Adidas Tracksuits -- See the Pic!
text: Madonna's 4-Year-Old Twins Are Adorable in Matching Adidas Tracksuits -- See the Pic! by Jennifer Drysdale 2:43 PM   Photo: Getty Images Madonna's twins' style is already fire. The 58-year-old singer took to Instagram on Tuesday to share an absolutely adorable pic of her newly adopted daughters, Stelle and Estere, rocking matching Adidas tracksuits. A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 21, 2017 at 9:20am PST RELATED: Madonna Reveals Names of Her Adopted Twin Daughters on Instagram Stelle and Estere have quickly become stars of their mom's Instagram since Madonna adopted the girls from Malawi earlier this month. The "Like a Prayer" singer, who also has two biological children, 20-year-old Lourdes Leon and 16-year-old Rocco Ritchie, has adopted from Malawi twice before, adopting son David Banda in 2008 and daughter Mercy James (both now 11 years old) a year later. It seems Stelle and Estere have already picked up on their mom's love of music, as the two sweetly gave a performance of "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" on Madonna's Instagram on Saturday. See more in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
